title: Fact-checking verification and sources
dataVerified: Fact-checker name, reporter, sources (may be confidential), publication
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Verification status (fact-checked/verified). Link to publication/fact-checking organization system (internal and legal, requires authentication)
rationale: Journalistic integrity. Domain binding verifies publication/fact-checking organization. Internal documents suitable for OCR. Prevents fabricated sources. Libel defense.
